flawed_nl_solution:
He will use $250 in fuel because 5 x 50 = <<5*50=250>>250
He will be shark hunting for 300 minutes because 5 x 60 = <<5*60=300>>300
He can expect to see 30 sharks because 300 / 10 = <<300/10=30>>30
He will make $540 off these photos because 30 x 15 = <<30*15=540>>540
He will make $290 in profit because 540 - 250 = <<540-250=290>>290
#### 290

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 450, not 540. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
